title: Positive
text: It's part of our culture to see positive. We love bringing about solutions, not problems.

title: Supportive
text: It's in our blood for everyone on our team to be supportive. We'll NEVER say 'I'd love to help you, but it's not my job'.

title: Self-starting
text: We are passionate and enthusiastic about building tools to empower non-technical business people so they can do what they're best at!
